All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bishop
Models the moveset of the bishop piece
Board
An 8x8 Grid the contains all the BoardSquare and Piece to play a game of chess
BoardSettings
Data Class for storing settings about the board/game
BoardSquare
Data class for representing a square on the chess board
BoardStyle
Themes for the board.
ChessApp
Handles loading the main menu and starting and stopping the database
Coordinates
Data class for storing row, column, x, and y of objects
Database
SQLite database for storing all past games
Game
The main game code that manages everything
GameController
Controller for Game UI
GameModeController
Controller for the Game Mode UI
King
Models the moveset of the king piece
Knight
Models the moveset of the knight piece
LeaderBoardController
UI Controller for the leaderboard screen
LeaderBoardEntry
A dataclass for an entry in the leaderboard Setup in a way where the database can auto create these when given data
Main
 
MainMenuController
UI Controller for the main menu screen
Pawn
Models the moveset of the pawn piece
PawnPromotionPopup
Handles the pawn promotion logic
Piece
Models a basic piece and what it can do Extends Image View so that it can have an image on it
PieceTutorialController
UI Controller for the Piece part of the tutorial Citation: All images and gifs are collected from Chess.com, Britannica kids.com and ragchess.com
Player
Dataclass for the player
PlayerSelectionScreenController
UI Controller for the player selection screen
Queen
Models the moveset of the queen piece
Rook
Models the moveset of the rook piece
SettingsMenuController
UI Controller for the settings screen
STLViewer
 
Stockfish
A simple and efficient client to run Stockfish from Java Originally from Rahul A R on GitHub Nick Rucinski worked on cleaning it up and extending it
Timer
A timer for keeping track of player time
TurnSystem
A system for keeping track of player turns and timers
TutorialScreenController
UI Controller for the tutorial screen
